item.title: [TR-12623] demo test case creation
item.description: this is used just for demo
item.summary: demo test case creation

status.description: Initial stage of Test case creation/ Peer preview

item.title: [TR-12620] ESTE- Loto_adv_cnt: Loto_shrink_ptm task is aborted when loto_adv_cnt task exceeding execution time in spare system
item.description:
The intent of this test case is to verify that loto_shrink_ptm task aborted when loto_adv_cnt task exceeding continuously in spare system

Preconditions:
1.Place 5 millions wager for loto game
2.ESTE is dayending and sxv_scheduler is starting for Lotto.

Note :Developer help is required to test this scenario
item.summary: ESTE- Loto_adv_cnt: Loto_shrink_ptm task is aborted when loto_adv_cnt task exceeding execution time in spare system

step.step: Verify the logs in ewatchEnsure loto_adv_cnt task is started
step.result: loto_adv_cnt task is started and running continuously

step.step: Verify before the shrink_ptm task starts it looks for adv_cnt_task to complete
step.result: Below messag ei sdispalyed in elog:"Waiting for task[adv_cnt] to finish"

step.step: Verify If loto_adv_cnt task is still running, Shrink PTM will wait for a thirty seconds before checking again
step.result: Verified

step.step: Verify shrink_ptm task checking 5 times for loto_adv_cnt task completed or not
step.result: Loto_shrink_ptm task send 5 times to check loto_adv_cnt task completed or notLog in Ewatch:0000820170622 79 05:19:19 I 0 loto:shrink_ptm 103:00028 Waiting for task [adv_cnt] to finish

step.step: Verify If Loto_adv_cnt task continuously running then Shrink PTM task will aborted
step.result: Shrink PTM task is failed with some appropriate error message:Log in Ewatch:0000820170622 79 05:21:49 W 0 loto:shrink_ptm 103:00028 Aborting. Rerun when task [adv_cnt] has finished

step.step: Once loto_adv_cnt task completed and run loto_shrink_ptm task manually in loto/bin directory
step.result: loto_shrink_ptm task run successfully

step.step: Repeat Step 1 to 6 for all DBG game and verify shrink_ptm is aborted
step.result: shrink_ptm task is aborted successfully for all DBG games

item.title: [TR-12619] ESIPS - Privileges : Verify ESIPS pages do not display the pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with no access privileges
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that in ESIPS pages do not display the pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with no access privileges.

Precondition:
-User is present in ESIPS page with no access permission.
item.summary: ESIPS - Privileges : Verify ESIPS pages do not display the pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with no access privileges

comments.comment:
We are having the "no access" permission in privileges list, thats why we are doing this test.
Giving "No access" privileges to the IPS pages e.g: manage games . stolen inventory tracking and we ensure that there is no pop up prompt is displayed.

step.step: Navigate to different ESIPS pages and verify the pop up message
step.result: No pop up prompt is displayed

step.step: Bounce the middle ware server and re-run the same test
step.result: Test completed successfully

item.title: [TR-12618] ESIPS - Privileges : Verify ESIPS pages displays do not display pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read only privileges
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that in all ESIPS pages do not display the pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read only privileges.

Precondition:
-User is present in ESIPS page with read only permission.
item.summary: ESIPS - Privileges : Verify ESIPS pages displays do not display pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read only privileges

step.step: Navigate to different ESIPS pages and verify the pop up message with/without making any changes
step.result: No pop up prompt is displayed

step.step: Bounce the middle ware server and rerun the same test as part of regression
step.result: Test completed successfully

item.title: [TR-12617] ESIPS - Privileges : Verify ESIPS pages displays correct pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read -write privileges
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that in all ESIPS pages displays correct pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read-write privileges.

Precondition:
-User is present in ESIPS page with read-write permission.
item.summary: ESIPS - Privileges : Verify ESIPS pages displays correct pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read -write privileges

step.step: Navigate to different ESIPS pages and verify the pop up message after making some changes
step.result: Pop up message is verified.

step.step: Save the changes via Submit option in the page and attempt to navigate away from the page
step.result: Data submitted successfully. No pop-up is displayed while navigating away from the page

step.step: Navigate to different ESIPS pages and verify the pop up message without making any changes
step.result: No pop up prompt is displayed

step.step: Verify that selection of any option within the pop-up window do not saves the data
step.result: Verified

step.step: Bounce the middle ware server and verify the privileges changes
step.result: Privileges changes is verified

item.title: [TR-12616] ESRM - Privileges : Verify ESRM pages do not display the pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with no access privileges
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that in ESRM pages do not display the pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with no access privileges.

Precondition:

item.summary: ESRM - Privileges : Verify ESRM pages do not display the pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with no access privileges

step.step: Navigate to different ESRM pages and verify the pop up message
step.result: No pop up prompt is displayed

step.step: Bounce the middle ware server and repeat the test
step.result: Verified successfully

item.title: [TR-12615] ESRM - Privileges : Verify ESRM pages do not display pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read only privileges
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that in all ESRM pages displays do not display pop up message if we are navigating away from the page with read only privileges.

Precondition:
-User is present in ESRM page with read only permission.
item.summary: ESRM - Privileges : Verify ESRM pages do not display pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read only privileges

step.step: Navigate to different ESRM pages and verify the pop up message with/without making any changes
step.result: No pop up prompt is displayed

step.step: Bounce the middle ware server and repeat the test
step.result: Verified successfully

item.title: [TR-12614] Merge Test -ESTE-F046762: Pennies in the terminal (Altura, B2B & CLTDBG) rollover Jackpot value of lotto winner information report is round down to zero
item.description:
The intent of the test case is to verify that pennies in the terminal (Altura, B2B & CLTDBG) rollover Jackpot value of lotto winner information report is round down to zero.

Preconditions:
Lotto draw is processed with rollover jackpot
item.summary: Merge Test -ESTE-F046762: Pennies in the terminal (Altura, B2B & CLTDBG) rollover Jackpot value of lotto winner information report is round down to zero

step.step: Verify pennies in the terminal (Altura, B2B & CLTDBG) rollover Jackpot value of lotto winner information report is round down to zero
step.result: Verified

item.title: [TR-12613] Merge Test -ESTE-F046762: Pennies in the Jackpot value and tier 1 of the loto spark xml is round down to zero.
item.description:
The intent of the testcase is to verify that pennies in the Jackpot value and tier 1 of the loto spark xml is round down to zero.

Preconditions:
Lotto draw is processed
Loto host result XML's are generated
item.summary: Merge Test -ESTE-F046762: Pennies in the Jackpot value and tier 1 of the loto spark xml is round down to zero.

step.step: Verify that pennies in the Jackpot value and tier 1 of the loto spark xml is round down to zero.
step.result: Verified

step.step: Verify the round down of penny value in jackpot for the unwon draw
step.result: Verified

step.step: Verify the round down of penny value in jackpot for the won draw
step.result: Verified

step.step: Verify the round down of penny value in jackpot for the must be won draw
step.result: Verified

step.step: Verify the round down of penny value in jackpot for the event draw.
step.result: Verified

step.step: Verify the round down of penny value in jackpot for the Tier 2 no winners (Tier 1 won/not won) draw
step.result: Verified

item.title: [TR-12612] ESRM - Privileges : Verify ESRM pages displays correct pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read -write privileges
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that in all ESRM pages displays correct pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read-write privileges after making some changes.

Precondition:
-User is present in ESRM page with read-write permission.
item.summary: ESRM - Privileges : Verify ESRM pages displays correct pop up message if user is navigating away from the page with read -write privileges

step.step: Navigate to different ESRM pages and verify the pop up message after making some changes
step.result: Pop up message is verified."Modified data will not be saved until Submit or Save is hit. You want to switch the context anyway?"

step.step: Save the changes via Submit option in the page and attempt to navigate away from the page
step.result: Data submitted successfully. No pop-up is displayed while navigating away from the page

step.step: Navigate to different ESRM pages and verify the pop up message without making any changes
step.result: No pop up prompt is displayed

step.step: Verify using the pop up data are not saved
step.result: Pop up do not save the data is verified

step.step: Bounce the middle ware server and verify the privileges changes
step.result: Privileges changes is verified

item.title: [TR-12611] Draw Processing -Delayed Drawseal : Delayed Drawseal task can be executed only if the draw status is closed
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that Delayed Draw seal task can be executed only if the draw status in draw closed for Euromillions and lotto

Preconditions:
-Delayed Euromillions and Lotto draw is available.
-Run the delayed_ drawseal task from program control/command line
item.summary: Draw Processing -Delayed Drawseal : Delayed Drawseal task can be executed only if the draw status is closed

comments.comment: Test case is updated based on the comments

step.step: When the delayed_drawseal task is triggered for the previous closed draw
step.result: The delayed_drawseal task is ran successfully for the closed draw

step.step: Verify the elog message for the delayed_drawseal task
step.result: ewatch message is verified

step.step: Verify the commands logged in ptm and mjf
step.result: Delayed_drawseal commands are logged correctly

step.step: Verify the draw seal report in reports directory
step.result: Draw seal report is verified

step.step: Ensure the delayed_drawseal task status in progconfig
step.result: The task status is verified

step.step: Run the delayed draw seal task for the current draw
step.result: the delayed draw seal task is aborted with appropriate error message

item.title: [TR-12610] Draw Processing -Delayed Draw seal: Delayed Draw seal task cannot be executed after the raffle share values final for Euromillions
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that Delayed draw seal task cannot be executed after the raffle share values final for Euromillions.

Preconditions:
-Euromillions delayed draw is available
-Euromillions raffle draw is processed till share values final.
-Run the delayed draw seal task from program control/command line
item.summary: Draw Processing -Delayed Draw seal: Delayed Draw seal task cannot be executed after the raffle share values final for Euromillions

step.step: The delayed_drawseal task is triggered
step.result: Then the raffle draw status is not changed. Its remains in the same draw status(share values final)

step.step: Verify the elog message for the delayed_drawseal task
step.result: ewatch message is verified

step.step: Verify the commands logged in ptm and mjf
step.result: dealyed_drawseal commands are logged correctly

step.step: Ensure the delayed_drawseal task status in progconfig
step.result: The task status is verified

item.title: [TR-12609] Draw Processing - Delayed Draw seal :Delayed draw seal task cannot be executed after the raffle share values final for lotto
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that Delayed Draw seal task cannot be executed after the raffle share values final for lotto.

Preconditions:
-Lotto delayed draw is available
-Lotto raffle draw processing is completed till share values final
-Run the delayed draw seal task from program control/command line
item.summary: Draw Processing - Delayed Draw seal :Delayed draw seal task cannot be executed after the raffle share values final for lotto

comments.comment: Test steps is updated based on comments.

step.step: The delayed draw seal task is triggered
step.result: The delayed draw seal task is failed and appropriate error message is dispalyed

step.step: Verify the elog message for the delayed draw seal task
step.result: ewatch message is verified

step.step: Verify the commands logged in ptm and mjf
step.result: Delayed Draw seal commands are logged correctly

step.step: Ensure the drawseal task status in progconfig
step.result: The task status is verified

item.title: [TR-12608] ESTE- adv_cnt: Verify adv_cnt task and shrink_ptm task executed successfully for huge data
item.description:
The intent of this test case is to verify that adv_cnt task and shrink_ptm task executed successfully for huge data

Preconditions:
1.Place bulk of wagers for all games with current draw & future draw through tsim
2.ESTE is dayending and sxv_scheduler is starting for Lotto.
item.summary: ESTE- adv_cnt: Verify adv_cnt task and shrink_ptm task executed successfully for huge data

step.step: Verify the logs in ewatchEnsure adv_cnt task is executed successfully in Duplex system
step.result: adv_cnt task is ran successfully without any error in Duplex system

step.step: shrink_ptm task is executed once completion adv_cnt task especially in Spare system
step.result: shrink_ptm task is executed successfully in spare system

step.step: Verify shrink_ptm task is triggered after adv_cnt task for all games
step.result: shrink_ptm and adv_cnt tasks ran successfully for all games

step.step: Go to /oltp/prosys/tmir/reports and verify advance sales report generating for all CDCs
step.result: Advance sales report generated for all CDCs

step.step: Verify Step 1 to 3 in simplex system
step.result: adv_cnt task and shrink_ptm task ran successfully in simplex system

step.step: Place bulk of all games wagers on non draw day and verify shrink_ptm task is triggered after adv_cnt task completion for all games
step.result: shrink_ptm and adv_cnt tasks ran successfully for all games during non draw day

item.title: [TR-12607] FINDATA load report: General adjustments are logged for retailers with no terminals configured
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that general adjustments created for a retailer with no terminal configured is correctly logged in findata_load report.


Precondition:
- General adjustments are created for retailer having no terminals configured
- General adjustments are created for retailer with terminals configured
-Post the adjustments for all retailer types -chain subordinate, chain head, independent.
-Post the adjustments for the retailers which are in different state- inactive, approved, deleted
-Dayend has been already completed
-findata_load_c<cdc>_english.rep is available in acct/reports directory
item.summary: FINDATA load report: General adjustments are logged for retailers with no terminals configured

step.step: Verify findata_load report
step.result: General adjustments created are correctly logged

step.step: Ensure the general adjustments that is created for retailers with no terminals are logged under Accounting product in findata_load report
step.result: general adjustments are logged under Accounting product

step.step: Ensure corresponding adjustment transaction type and description is correctly mentioned in report
step.result: Adjustment transaction type and description is correct

step.step: Verify other sales details mentioned in findata_load report
step.result: Sales details verified

item.title: [TR-12606] FINDATA load report: Scratchcard adjustments are logged for retailers with no terminals configured
item.description:
The intent of the test is to verify that scratchcard adjustments created for a retailer with no terminal configured is correctly logged in findata_load report.


Precondition:
- Scratchcard adjustments are created for retailer having no terminals configured
- Scratchcard adjustments are created for retailer with terminals configured
-Post the adjustments for all retailer types -chain subordinate, chain head, independent.
-Post the adjustments for the retailers which are in different state- inactive, approved, deleted
-Dayend has been already completed
-findata_load_c<cdc>_english.rep is available in acct/reports directory
item.summary: FINDATA load report: Scratchcard adjustments are logged for retailers with no terminals configured

step.step: Verify findata_load report
step.result: Scratchcard adjustments created are correctly logged

step.step: Ensure the Scratchcard adjustments that is created for retailers with no terminals are logged under Accounting product in findata_load report
step.result: Scratchcard adjustments are logged under Accounting product

step.step: Ensure corresponding adjustment transaction type and description is correctly mentioned in report
step.result: Adjustment transaction type and description is correct

step.step: Verify other sales details mentioned in findata_load report
step.result: Sales details verified

item.title: [TR-12605] ESTE- adv_cnt: Verify loto_shrink_ptm task is triggered after loto_adv_cnt task during delayed draw
item.description:
The intent of this test case is to verify that loto_adv_cnt task and loto_shrink_ptm task runs successfully in Duplex system (primary and spare) during delayed draw

Preconditions:
1.ESTE is dayending
2.Lotto draw processed delayed draw
3.Load Win_load manually
4.sxv_scheduler task is started for lotto.
item.summary: ESTE- adv_cnt: Verify loto_shrink_ptm task is triggered after loto_adv_cnt task during delayed draw

step.step: Verify the logs in ewatchEnsure loto_adv_cnt task is executed successfully in Duplex system during delayed draw
step.result: loto_adv_cnt task is ran successfully without any error in Duplex system during delayed draw

step.step: Verify loto_shrink_ptm task is executed once completion of loto_adv_cnt task especially in Spare system
step.result: loto_shrink_ptm task is executed successfully in spare system

step.step: Verify shrink_ptm task is triggered after adv_cnt task for all games during delayed draw
step.result: shrink_ptm and adv_cnt tasks ran successfully for all games during delayed draw

step.step: Go to /oltp/prosys/tmir/reports and verify advance sales report generating for all CDCs
step.result: Advance sales report generated for all CDCs

step.step: Verify Step 1 to 3 in simplex system
step.result: adv_cnt task and shrink_ptm task ran successfully in simplex system

item.title: [TR-12604] ESMM Toolkit-Preview Functionality-Altura : Preview channel after changing the observer data
item.description:
The intent of test case is to verify correct shows are previewed after changing the observer data
Preconditions:
-Connection between Toolkit and ESMM player in Altura is successful
- Shows based on below criteria are added to the channel:
   Show with continuous play(no date/time restrictions)
   Continuous play show with scenario based on lotto observers jackpot value 1000000
   Show with scenario based on lotto observers jackpot value 2000000
   Continuous play show with scenario based on elot observers jackpot value 1000000
   Show with scenario based on elot observers jackpot value 2000000
item.summary: ESMM Toolkit-Preview Functionality-Altura : Preview channel after changing the observer data

status.description: Initial stage of Test case creation/ Peer preview

step.step: Preview channel using continuous play show with defined scenarios based on observers and groups configured
step.result: Preview of Below shows are displayed1.Continuous play show with scenarios and groups configured

step.step: Verify that below shows are not displayed1.Show with continuous play(no date/time restrictions)2.Show with scenario based on observers3.Continuous play show with scenario based on observers
step.result: Below shows are not displayed1.Show with continuous play(no date/time restrictions)2.Show with scenario based on observers3.Continuous play show with scenario based on observers

item.title: [TR-12603] ESMM Toolkit-Preview Functionality-CLT/CLTDBG : Preview channel using shows that are created based on date and time schedule
item.description:
The intent of test case is to verify preview channel using shows that are created based on date and time schedule

Preconditions:
-Connection between Toolkit and ESMM player in CLT/CLTDBG is successful
- Shows based on below criteria are added to the channel:
   Show with continuous play(no date/time restrictions)
   Shows displayed during draw break time
   Shows that are not displayed in draw break
   Shows that are displayed on particular date
   Shows that are displayed on particular day of week
item.summary: ESMM Toolkit-Preview Functionality-CLT/CLTDBG : Preview channel using shows that are created based on date and time schedule

status.description: Initial stage of Test case creation/ Peer preview

step.step: Preview channel using shows that are displayed during draw break time
step.result: Preview of Below shows are displayed1.Show with continuous play(no date/time restrictions)2.Shows displayed during draw break time

step.step: Verify that below shows are not displayed1.Shows that are not displayed in draw break2.Shows that are displayed on particular date3.Shows that are displayed on particular day of week
step.result: Below shows are not displayed1.Shows that are not displayed in draw break2.Shows that are displayed on particular date3.Shows that are displayed on particular day of week

step.step: Preview channel using shows that are not displayed during draw break time
step.result: Preview of Below shows are displayed1.Show with continuous play(no date/time restrictions)2.Shows that are not displayed in draw break

step.step: Preview channel using shows that are displayed on particular date
step.result: Preview of Below shows are displayed1.Shows that are displayed on particular date2.Show with continuous play(no date/time restrictions)

step.step: Preview channel using shows that are displayed on particular day of week
step.result: Preview of Below shows are displayed1.Shows that are displayed on particular day of week2.Show with continuous play(no date/time restrictions)
